data.title: Beasley Media Group, LLC
data.text:
Beasley Media Group (BMG) Executive Vice President of Programming Justin Chase has been elected to serve on the Radio Board of the National Association of Broadcasters (NAB). He will officially begin his two-year term in June of 2018.

Florida Association of Broadcasters announced that Caroline Beasley, CEO of Beasley Media Group will be the keynote speaker for their June 28th luncheon at the Vinoy in St. Petersburg.

Beasley Media Group Chief Executive Officer Caroline Beasley has been named the 2018 Talkers Magazine Woman of the Year. She will be presented with the “The Judy Jarvis Memorial Award for Outstanding Contributions to the Radio Industry by a Woman” award during the publication’s upcoming TALKERS 2018: Full Speed Ahead! national talk media industry convention in New York City on

WASHINGTON, D.C.– Award-winning country music band Old Dominion will perform at the new We Are Broadcasters Celebration on Tuesday, April 10 on the NAB Show Main Stage in the North Hall of the Las Vegas Convention Center. The special live performance is sponsored by Beasley Media Group.

Naples, Florida (3/26/18): Beasley Media Group, LLC; a subsidiary of Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: BBGI) announces Beasley Media Group Chief Operating Officer Brian Beasley was recently honored at The Meggan Morency 8th Annual Wild West Night.

Naples, Florida (March 26, 2018): Beasley Media Group, LLC is proud to announce that Vice President of Digital Operations, Kimberly Sonneborn, has been selected as a mentee for the 2018 MIW Group Mildred Carter Mentoring Program. Beasley Media Group, LLC is the lead sponsor of this year’s program. “It is an honor to support the MIW Radio Group’s mission of

[et_pb_section bb_built=\”1\”][et_pb_row][et_pb_column type=\”4_4\”][et_pb_text] March is National Women\’s History Month and Beasley Media Group, LLC is celebrating all the women in our company who do their Beasley Best each and every day.

LOS ANGELES – March 06, 2018 — Triton Digital®, the global technology and services leader to the digital audio and podcast industry, today announced that Beasley Media Group, a subsidiary of Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc., has renewed and expanded its relationship with Triton Digital to power the delivery, measurement, and monetization of their streaming audio

NAPLES, Florida, March 1, 2018 – Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. (Nasdaq: BBGI) (“the Company”), a large- and mid-size market radio broadcaster, announced today that Chief Financial Officer, Marie Tedesco, will be participating in the Deutsche Bank Media, Telecom & Business Services Conference held at The Breakers Hotel in Palm Beach, Florida.
